column5: Does anyone know the current cost per license for a week license? We usually pick ours up in Souix Narrows on the way to Minaki and two years ago you could use a credit card but last year it was cash only. Lots of cash!!!!
It is possible to order the license and outdoor card by phone. I got mine in about 9 days. Order Canadian Fishing License & Outdoor Card by phone: 800-667-1940.the cost was about $50 for both.
$25.25 for a seven day conservation, $9.00 for the Outdoors card that is now required.
Hi. i was thinking of spending the summer up there, just the wife and i fishing. how much would that be. I guess conservation is all we would need. thanks.
